resources.string: You have successfully created your account with ABC Banking. Please read below the funding information for your accounts.
Earn a monthly interest of 0.1%. No monthly fee and a $500 minimum balance required.
No interest account with the ability to draw checks from. No minimum balance required.
Certificate of Deposit account. Interest Rates fluctates. Starts at 1%. $1000 Minimum balance required.
Individual Retirement Account. Fixed interest rate of 2%. $5000 minimum balance required.
